name: Homix
0:
”Alexa, turn on kitchen light”
”Alexa, set the thermostat to 23 degrees”
”Alexa, set kitchen light to 50 percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With Homix and Alexa you can turn your lights and smart switches on and off comfortably by voice control. Smart switches and Alexa enable you to turn devices (e. g. floor lamp, coffee machine,...) on and off easily. Smart bulbs can also be dimmed/changed color by voice command. You can also change the temperature of your thermostat.

To use the Homix skill, you need the Homix Home device and an active Homix account.
